jobListings.title: Founding AI Engineer [GenAI/LLM's]
jobListings.description: Lead the development of GenAI/LLM solutions for global clients. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative AI products.
jobListings.aboutJob: At Oryx Search, we believe in pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence to create solutions that transform how businesses operate. As a Founding AI Engineer, you'll be at the forefront of GenAI and LLM development, working with cutting-edge technologies to build products that will shape the future of AI-powered search and discovery.
jobListings.roleDescription: As a Founding AI Engineer, you will be a key member of our founding team, responsible for architecting and implementing AI systems that leverage the latest in Generative AI and Large Language Models. You'll work closely with our product and engineering teams to deliver innovative solutions that exceed client expectations.
responsibilities: Design and implement GenAI/LLM solutions for enterprise clients
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define AI product requirements
Optimize model performance and ensure scalability of AI systems
Stay current with latest developments in AI/ML and implement best practices
Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical decision-making
Work with data scientists to improve model accuracy and efficiency
Implement robust testing and monitoring for AI systems
Contribute to the company's AI strategy and technical roadmap
requirements: 5+ years experience in software engineering with focus on AI/ML
Expert-level proficiency in Python and AI/ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Hands-on experience with LLMs and GenAI technologies
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and deep learning
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and MLOps
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced startup environment
Experience with vector databases and embedding technologies
jobRequirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, AI, or related field preferred
Minimum 5 years of experience in AI/ML engineering
Proven track record of deploying AI systems in production
Experience with transformer architectures and attention mechanisms
Knowledge of prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques
Familiarity with distributed computing and parallel processing
Experience with API design and microservices architecture
Strong background in statistics and mathematical modeling
benefits: Remote work flexibility with Dubai office access
Equity package with significant upside potential
Professional development budget for conferences and training
Flexible working hours and unlimited PTO policy
jobListings.salaryBenefits: Join us in Dubai and enjoy a competitive tax-free salary ranging from $120K to $150K annually, plus equity participation in a high-growth AI startup. We offer comprehensive benefits including health insurance, visa sponsorship, and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies.

jobListings.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobListings.description: Work on mission-critical systems for a leading airline. Mentor junior engineers and ensure code quality.
jobListings.aboutJob: At Emirates, we believe in connecting the world through our global hub in Dubai and constantly innovating to ensure our customers 'Fly Better'. Emirates Group IT thrives on the advancement of technology and is always at the forefront of aviation innovation. We are looking for exceptional IT professionals to fortify our position as leaders in the industry.
jobListings.roleDescription: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be a fully participating member of an agile feature team, independently working on software development and problem resolution. The role involves technical design, software development, implementation, and maintenance of software solutions/products that support the Emirates Group business.
responsibilities: Work with senior technical engineers in the technical design process by contributing to analyzing technical application requirements
Convert technical solutions for small to medium-sized initiatives into low-level design and working code
Implement clean, secure and optimized code while implementing Emirates Group approved coding standards
Participate in rotational on-call support, actively resolving production issues within SLAs with minimal supervision
Ensure built-in quality and 100% unit testing as part of the CI/CD pipeline
Perform thorough peer code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Promote refactoring practices to ensure minimum code debt
Implement logging and monitoring hooks in code development
Continuously stay current with relevant technologies and enhance code quality
Adhere to the Emirates Group IT coding standards and contribute to Software Engineering Playbooks
requirements: 4+ years experience in backend development
Proficient in Java or C# with enterprise-level experience
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Strong knowledge of microservices architecture
Excellent communication and mentoring skills
jobRequirements: Degree or Honours in a relevant field (Computer Science, Computational Mathematics, Computer Engineering, or Software Engineering)
Minimum 5 years of experience in Backend Application Development, primarily in Java (versions 8+) with microservices capability
Backend Technologies: Java 8+, Spring, Spring Boot, RestFul API, SOAP, Microservices, Design Patterns
Frontend Technologies: React JS
Database Technologies: Relational (Oracle, SQL Server, Postgres); NoSQL (Couchbase, MongoDB, Elastic Search, Cassandra)
Cloud Technologies: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud
DevOps: Git, Docker, OpenShift, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Splunk, JIRA, Confluence
Testing: Unit, Integration, Performance, Security
Automation Testing: Jasmine, Jest, Karma, Junit, mockito, Jmock, Jmeter
Experience in developing complex technology software solutions for large organizations and providing production support using ITIL framework
Data experience in Full stack development, technology evaluation, vendor selection, and implementation
Familiarity with contemporary engineering practices like CI/CD, managing technology platforms, and ensuring a robust code base
benefits: Competitive salary and career advancement opportunities
Generous travel benefits and flight discounts
jobListings.salaryBenefits: Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary, travel benefits exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotel stays worldwide.

jobListings.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobListings.description: Develop and maintain scalable web applications. Collaborate with product managers and designers.
jobListings.aboutJob: Emirates Group IT is seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join our web development team. You'll be working on customer-facing applications that serve millions of passengers worldwide, ensuring they have the best digital experience when planning and booking their travels.
jobListings.roleDescription: As a Senior Software Engineer focusing on web development, you'll be responsible for creating and maintaining scalable, high-performance web applications. You'll work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and other engineers to deliver exceptional user experiences.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain responsive web applications using modern frameworks
Collaborate with product managers and designers to implement user-friendly interfaces
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Implement and maintain automated testing suites
Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards
Work with backend teams to integrate APIs and services
Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues
Stay updated with latest web development trends and technologies
requirements: 3+ years experience in web development
Strong knowledge of React or Angular frameworks
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Familiarity with REST APIs and GraphQL
Experience with responsive design principles
jobRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Minimum 3 years of experience in frontend web development
Expert knowledge of React.js or Angular framework
Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, NgRx)
Knowledge of build tools (Webpack, Gulp, npm/yarn)
Familiarity with version control systems (Git)
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress, Jasmine)
Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques
jobListings.salaryBenefits: Enjoy a competitive tax-free salary in Dubai with flexible working arrangements and comprehensive benefits package including health insurance and travel perks.

jobListings.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobListings.description: Maintain and optimize airline booking systems. Ensure high availability and performance.
jobListings.aboutJob: Join Emirates' core systems team responsible for maintaining and enhancing the airline's critical booking and reservation systems. These systems handle millions of transactions daily and require the highest levels of reliability and performance.
jobListings.roleDescription: As a Senior Software Engineer on the booking systems team, you'll be responsible for maintaining, optimizing, and enhancing mission-critical airline systems. You'll work with high-volume, high-availability systems that serve customers worldwide.
responsibilities: Maintain and optimize airline booking and reservation systems
Ensure high availability and performance of critical systems
Implement system monitoring and alerting mechanisms
Troubleshoot and resolve production issues quickly
Collaborate with database administrators for query optimization
Participate in system architecture decisions and improvements
Implement security best practices for sensitive customer data
Document system processes and maintain technical documentation
requirements: 5+ years experience in enterprise systems development
Strong knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience with microservices architecture
Understanding of high-availability system design
Experience with performance optimization
jobRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
Minimum 5 years of experience in enterprise software development
Strong expertise in database technologies (Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB)
Experience with microservices and distributed systems architecture
Knowledge of caching strategies and performance optimization
Familiarity with message queuing systems (RabbitMQ, Apache Kafka)
Experience with monitoring tools (New Relic, Datadog, Splunk)
Understanding of airline industry systems (GDS, PSS) is a plus
Experience with high-volume transaction processing
Knowledge of security best practices for financial transactions
jobListings.salaryBenefits: Competitive tax-free salary with annual bonus potential, comprehensive benefits, and the opportunity to work on systems that impact millions of travelers worldwide.

jobListings.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobListings.description: Lead a team of engineers to deliver high-quality software. Drive technical innovation.
jobListings.aboutJob: Emirates is looking for a Senior Software Engineer with leadership experience to join our innovation team. You'll lead a team of talented engineers while driving technical excellence and innovation across our software development initiatives.
jobListings.roleDescription: As a Senior Software Engineer with leadership responsibilities, you'll guide a team of engineers in delivering high-quality software solutions. You'll be responsible for technical decision-making, mentoring team members, and ensuring best practices are followed.
responsibilities: Lead and mentor a team of software engineers
Drive technical innovation and best practices adoption
Participate in architectural decisions and technical planning
Conduct code reviews and ensure quality standards
Collaborate with product managers on feature planning
Identify and implement process improvements
Provide technical guidance and support to team members
Represent the team in cross-functional meetings and planning sessions
requirements: 6+ years experience in software development
Proven leadership and mentoring experience
Strong coding and system architecture skills
Experience with agile development methodologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
jobRequirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
Minimum 6 years of software development experience
At least 2 years of team leadership or mentoring experience
Strong technical skills in multiple programming languages
Experience with software architecture and design patterns
Knowledge of agile development methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Experience with performance management and team development
Understanding of software development lifecycle and best practices
Ability to balance technical and business requirements
jobListings.salaryBenefits: Competitive tax-free salary with leadership bonuses, comprehensive benefits package, and opportunities for professional growth in a leadership role within a global organization.
